function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Workers at risk of exposure to SARS-CoV-2 in the workplace","Impact":"Increased risk of contracting COVID-19, leading to lost days due to illness and potential spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Implement control measures based on risk levels, conduct risk management programs, and prioritize the use of engineering controls, administrative controls, and PPE","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purification technologies, and other engineering control technologies","People":"Workers in the workplace","Owner":"Employers and occupational safety and health experts"},{"Description":"Inability to eliminate COVID-19 from the workplace","Impact":"Continued risk of exposure to SARS-CoV-2 and potential new infections in the workplace","Mitigation":"Implement preventive efforts to minimize the probability of exposure, apply administrative controls and PPE, and conduct regular monitoring of controls","Technologies":"Training programs, ventilation systems, and air purification technologies","People":"Workers in the workplace","Owner":"Employers and occupational safety and health experts"},{"Description":"Limited effectiveness of control measures","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to COVID-19 and potential spread of the virus despite control efforts","Mitigation":"Prioritize the use of engineering controls, administrative controls, and PPE based on the hierarchy of controls, and conduct regular monitoring of controls","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purification technologies, and other engineering control technologies","People":"Workers in the workplace","Owner":"Employers and occupational safety and health experts"}]}
